info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44781
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;openacademie.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44781
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;openacademie.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
openacademie.beta.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	betagouv-redirections.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
betagouv-redirections.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	3600	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2275970395 10000 2400 604800 3600
